title: Introduction
text:
Hi! My name is Barrett Buhler, and I am currently a first-year Master’s student at the University of Toronto, specializing in biostatistics. I am conducting research at SickKids in the Strug Lab under the guidance of Lisa Strug and Delnaz Roshandel. My academic interests are primarily centered around machine learning and its applications in healthcare.
Outside of work, I enjoy surfing, travelling and playing chess. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me on Linkedin.

text:

title: Introduction
text:
Experience
SickKids | Researcher | Sept 2024 - Present
Currently apart of Strug Lab researching sub-genotypes of Rolandic Epilepsy
University of Toronto Department of Statistical Sciences | Teaching Assistant | Sept 2024 - Present
Teaching Assistant for STA302, a course that serves as an introduction to regression analyses for third year statistics students
UNC School of Medicine | AI Researcher | June 2023 - May 2024
Worked as an AI reseacher under Dr. Faisal Syed to develop deep learning models with ECG data
UNC Impact Investing | Co-Founder | August 2020 - May 2024
Established the Climate Resilience Fund, UNC’s first student-led impact investment fund incorporated under Kenan Flagler
